form.label: CIP-007 R4.2: Security Event Monitoring
form.description: Log events at the BES Cyber System level (per BES Cyber System capability) or at the Cyber Asset level (per Cyber Asset capability) for identification of, and after-the-fact investigations of, Cyber Security Incidents

search.query: | tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication where Authentication.app="win:remote" AND Authentication.dest!="localhost" AND Authentication.src!="localhost" by _time,Authentication.src,Authentication.user,Authentication.dest,Authentication.action,Authentication.signature span=1s | `drop_dm_object_name("Authentication")` | `get_cip_info_by_dns(dest, "dest")` | `get_cip_info_by_dns(src, "src")` | search $esp_facility_tok$ $espZone_tok$ | eval dest_nt_host=if(isnull(dest_nt_host), dest, dest_nt_host) | eval src_nt_host=if(isnull(src_nt_host), src, src_nt_host) | stats count by _time,src_nt_host,user,dest_nt_host,action,signature
| inputlookup cip_asset_lookup.csv | search classification="*cip:eap*" | `get_esp_zone(zone)` | dedup zone sortby zone | fields zone
| inputlookup cip_asset_lookup.csv | search classification="*cip:eap*" | dedup location sortby location | fields location

html.h1: R4.2.2 - Detected failure of Part 4.1 Event Logging

search.query: | inputlookup cip_asset_lookup.csv | search asset_type!="PLC" asset_type!="OT Device" asset_type!="removable media" | eval extracted_host=nt_host | join type=left extracted_host [| tstats `summariesonly` min(_time) as lastEventDate from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication by Authentication.src,host | `drop_dm_object_name("Authentication")` | eval nt_host=if(host="127.0.0.1", src, host) | rex field=nt_host "(?<extracted_host>[^\.]+)" | eventstats min(lastEventDate) as lastEventDate by extracted_host | fillnull lastReportTime value="Never reported in" | eval dayDiff=(now() - lastEventDate)/60/60/24 | dedup extracted_host,dayDiff | fields extracted_host,dayDiff] | `get_esp_zone(zone)` | fillnull dayDiff value=0.0 | where dayDiff=0 | stats dc(nt_host)

| inputlookup cip_asset_lookup.csv | join type=left nt_host [| tstats `summariesonly` latest(_time) as lastEventDate from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication by Authentication.src,host | `drop_dm_object_name("Authentication")` | eval nt_host=if(host="127.0.0.1", src, host) | fields nt_host,lastEventDate] | search classification="*cip*" | `get_esp_zone(zone)` | fillnull lastEventDate value="Unknown" | eval _time=lastEventDate | eval eventType="Authentication" | table nt_host,zone,location,_time,eventType | `dayDiff` | fillnull dayDiff value=0 | search dayDiff > 1 | stats dc(nt_host)

| inputlookup cip_asset_lookup.csv | search requires_av="TRUE" | eval extracted_host=nt_host | join type=left extracted_host [| pivot Malware Malware_Operations earliest(_time) AS firstDate SPLITROW dest | eval lastEventDate=strptime(firstDate, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3Q%z") | rex field=dest "(?<extracted_host>[^\.]+)" | eval dayDiff=(now() - lastEventDate)/60/60/24 | fields extracted_host,lastReportDate,dayDiff] | `get_esp_zone(zone)` | fillnull dayDiff value=0.0 | where dayDiff=0 | stats dc(nt_host)

| inputlookup cip_asset_lookup.csv | search requires_av="TRUE" | join type=left nt_host [| from inputlookup:malware_operations_tracker | eval nt_host=dest, lastReportTime=_time | fields nt_host,lastReportTime] | fillnull lastReportTime value="Unknown" | eval _time=lastReportTime | `dayDiff` | where dayDiff > 1 | stats dc(nt_host)

html.h1: R4.2.1 - Detected Malicious code alerts triggered

search.query: `notable` | search search_name="*infect*" OR search_name="*malware*" OR search_name="*outbreak*" | `get_cip_info_by_ip(dest, "dest")` | `get_cip_info_by_hostname(dest, "dest")` | search dest_classification="*cip*" $esp_facility_tok$ $espZone_tok$ | `get_esp_zone(dest_zone)` | table _time, dest, priority, rule_name, owner, status_description,status_end,dest_zone | rename dest as Host, rule_name as Alert, owner as "Assignee", priority as Priority, status_description as "Status", _time as "Triggered Time", status_end as "Is Closed", dest_zone as "ESP Zone" | convert ctime("Triggered Time")
